title: RIP Teemo (2009-2017)
body:
4 days, going on 5 now since Teemo was disabled and this minor bug has not been hotfixed yet.  
 
-Frustrated Teemo main who apparently won't be playing him this 3-day weekend.

replies.body:
>minor bug

I'm curious why you think it's a minor bug. They don't disable champions for minor bugs, this was gamebreaking.

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=arbTGzJA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-16T02:22:00.180+0000)
>
> I'm curious why you think it's a minor bug. They don't disable champions for minor bugs, this was gamebreaking.

Gamebreaking?  lol

Hardly.

The 'minor' part was actually in reference to how easy it would probably be to fix.  
Granted I don't code, does it really take 3+ days for developers, who have been working on this game for years, to make it so that a passive doesn't activate again after attacking from a bush?

>The 'minor' part was actually in reference to how easy it would probably be to fix.

Right, because you know exactly what in the code is broken. 

>Granted I don't code

So why are you even talking?
And yes, going invis and untargetable after every attack is pretty busted.
free attack speed while attacking is game breaking
a level 2 teemo with decent attack speed runes can easily abuse get out of hand with this bug of his no matter the elo, it seems small but its actually not.

It can if they dont know the cause, but likely no it doesn't. However 1 champion (even more so that it is Teemo) is not necessarily a drop everything and fix it issue, so they may be taking their time with him since the new LCS season starts soon and he is only a "troll"/"accidental" pick who honestly is not likely to ever again be played in the LCS as much as he did this past season.

In memory of Riven 2k16.

YES IT TAKES A WHILE TO FIX A BUG IF ITS GAMEBREAKING!!

If you don't have any experience, don't hate on Riot. They are probably doing all they can. They NEVER disable a champ this long due to a "minor" bug.

Play shaco instead.

Basically the same thing, except even more annoying and hilarious. Bonus points in you set up traps so the fear from one trap forces someone into the next trap.
People main teemo? Just to run top and feed? Weird
